title: Ep 204 | Phil Robertson's Answer to Capitol Violence and American Chaos
description:
Phil believes we may be seeing the fall of America, but it's not over yet. Phil, Jase, and Al share much-needed hope for Americans and offer a Jesus-centered perspective on the violence at the U.S. Capitol and turmoil in our republic.
